sentences.sContent: You'd better seek advice from your father before you reinvest your money with the firm.
sentences.sContent_eng: You'd better seek advice from your father before you reinvest your money with the firm.
sentences.sCn: 你向这个公司再投资之前最好先征询一下你父亲的意见。

sentences.sContent: But the people in the industry only knew how to reinvest it [so they squandered a lot of capital].
sentences.sContent_eng: But the people in the industry only knew how to reinvest it [so they squandered a lot of capital].
sentences.sCn: 然而那个产业中的人只知道再投资一个公司（所以很多钱都打了水漂）。

sentences.sContent: Another advantage of Treasury Direct is that you can access your account on the Web to check account balances or reinvest a security when it matures.
sentences.sContent_eng: Another advantage of Treasury Direct is that you can access your account on the Web to check account balances or reinvest a security when it matures.
sentences.sCn: “国库券直达”的另一个优势就是你可以通过网络进入你的账户并查看账户余额，或者在一项投资到期时进行再投资。

remMethod.val: re(再) + invest(投资) → 再投资

trans.tranOther: to use money you have earned from  investment s  to buy additional investments
